pages.text: Harvey, the boy's sole companion in this alien landscape, had never been more than a simple house pet. He was a dog of indeterminate breed, with a shaggy coat that seemed to change colour under different lights. Harvey had a knack for looking perpetually surprised, his eyes wide and ears always at attention. The boy had always found this endearing but in this strange place, he found it a source of comfort.
